backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, mod settings, item spawner, and process selector with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files and hooks.
frontend/ANDROID_APK_BUILD.md: Guide explaining how to build an Android APK using Bubblewrap and TWA, including Quest-specific notes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme defining color tokens and light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring page title, manifest, viewport, and mounting root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining browser app metadata, colors, icons, and shortcuts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the BrowserPage and toast system.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper handling II login, profile setup flow, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/components/ModStatusBar.tsx: Displays active mod settings with badges, counting enabled mods and showing their parameters.
Fetches and filters a prefab catalog, providing search, copy-to-clipboard, and various loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/ProcessSelectorP: Shows available game processes, allows selecting one, and supports refreshing and handling missing selections.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Collects a user name and initializes a default profile through a save mutation with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppToAppLink.ts: Manages a persistent deep link value stored in localStorage with setters and reset capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useBrowserHistory.ts: Implements simple in‑memory browser-like navigation with back, forward, and go functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useItemSpawner.ts: Retrieves item spawner data and adds items while keeping a local log of spawn actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useModSettings.ts: Manages mod settings by syncing backend profile data with localStorage and providing update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefabCatalog.ts: Fetches a static prefab catalog JSON file using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProcessSelector.ts: Loads and updates the selected process via backend queries with simple error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps various backend actor calls with react-query hooks for profiles, items, and process management.
frontend/src/hooks/useRuntimeEnv.ts: Detects runtime environment details like Android, Quest Browser, and VR mode from the user agent.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BrowserPage.tsx: Implements an in-app browser with navigation controls and an iframe for loading URLs.
frontend/src/pages/ModMenuPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a mod menu page.
frontend/src/state/modSettings.ts: Defines mod settings defaults and utilities for clamping and persisting client-side settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and managing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color mappings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a laptop‑only 2D web‑browser‑style app with iframe loading, listing existing features, a pending feature request, and metadata about versions and notes.
